subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Luge Racing
Citizenship
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Bengt and Ashley Walden met while competing a decade ago and married in 2006. Bengt, a former Swedish Olympian, hopes to make the United States luge team and so does Ashley.
